#summary Describes project Embox's usage on Bifferboard

= HOW-TO =

 # checkout Bifferboard's utils
{{{
svn co https://bifferboard.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/bifferboard/utils
}}}
 # plug-in ethernet and usb cables to Bifferboard
 # run minicom
 # configure Bifferboard
{{{
./run bb_eth_setconfig.py
}}}
  # set "Terget MAC"
  # set "Flash Size" to "8 MB"
  # set "Boot image type" to "flat binary"
  # set "Load address" to "0x400000"
  # push "Connect" (status Polling)
  # switch power on
  # push "Write" (if status is Connected)
 # build Embox with x86/bifferboard template
 # flash Bifferboard (set your board's MAC)
{{{
./bb_eth_upload8.py eth0 00:b3:f6:00:6e:6f path/embox.bin
}}}
 # reset Bifferboard
